actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution authorizing the President of the Senate to administer the oath of office to the Honorable Jay Rockefeller, of West Virginia.

summary.text: Authorizes the President of the Senate to administer the oath of office to the Honorable Jay Rockefeller, of West Virginia, on January 15, 1985.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing the President of the Senate to administer the oath of office to the Honorable Jay Rockefeller, of West Virginia.
